instructions: From any home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap Mobile networks . Select the Data enabled checkbox to it turn on. If roaming outside the T-Mobile network: Select the Data roaming check box. Review the Attention message. Tap OK to confirm. Tap Access point names . Tap the Menu key. To create a new APN, tap New APN . To reset the APN settings, tap Reset to default . An APN must be created first in order to reset the APN to default. Verify and update the following settings for the Data APN: Name: T-Mobile US LTE APN: epc.tmobile.com Proxy: <Not set> Port: <Not set> Username: <Not set> Password: <Not set> Server: <Not set> MMSC: http://mms.msg.eng.t-mobile.com/mms/wapenc MMS proxy: <Not set> MMS port: <Not set> MMS protocol: WAP 2.0 MCC: 310 MNC: 260 Authentication type: <Not set> APN type: <Not set> OR Internet+MMS APN protocol: IPv4/IPv6 APN roaming protocol: IPv4 Enable/disable APN: <grayed out unless there are multiple APN's Bearer: Unspecified Tap the Menu key. Tap Save . Tap the desired APN profile you want to use. The bullet point fills with green next to the APN profile.
Select the Data roaming check box. Review the Attention message. Tap OK to confirm.

From any home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap Mobile networks . Tap Network operators . Tap Search networks . Select the network you want to use.

From any home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap Mobile networks . Tap Network mode . Tap to select one of the following: GSM/WCDMA auto WCDMA only GSM only
Drag down the Quick Settings menu from the top of the screen. Tap the Airplane mode icon to turn it on or off. On: The icon turns blue. Off: The icon turns gray.

From any home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap Mobile networks . Select the Data roaming check box.

From any home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Tethering & Networks . Tap Mobile networks . Tap the Mobile data checkbox to it turn on or off.
